original_title: Carta del apóstol San Juaneco a la ciudad del mal
overview: In this short, the main character, who calls himself San Juaneco comes across a fugitive from Lima in the outskirts of the city. Convinced that he must rid the man of demons to found the City of Good, he ties the fugitive to a cross.
title: Carta del apóstol San Juaneco a la ciudad del mal
